^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ACF.longDescription: A collection of access control file properties.
OEM Extension for ManagerAccount to provide the Service account extension.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ACFFile.longDescription: Base 64 encoded ACF contents. Contents must have a valid signature, expiration date, and serial number must match BMC serial number

ExpirationDate.description: The expiration date of the ACF file.
ExpirationDate.longDescription: The expiration date of the ACF file, if the expiration date has been from the BMC then the ACF is not valid.

WarningLongDatedExpiration.description: This property is set to true if there is a long dated expiration.
WarningLongDatedExpiration.longDescription: This property is set to true if the expiration date on the ACF exceeds 30 days from the BMC date.

ACFInstalled.description: This property is set to true if the ACF is installed.
ACFInstalled.longDescription: This property indicates if the ACF is installed or not.

title: #OemManagerAccount
